meanings.definition: A type of fabric resembling velvet but made of cotton.
meanings.sent1: She loved the soft touch of velveteens against her skin.
meanings.sent2: The tailor crafted a beautiful dress using velveteens.
meanings.sent3: The cat curled up on a pile of velveteens, thinking it was a cozy bed.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in shades of velveteens.
meanings.sent5: The old chair was reupholstered with luxurious velveteens.

meanings.sent1: He wore his favorite pair of velveteens to the party.
meanings.sent2: The fashion store displayed various colors of velveteens.
meanings.sent3: The velveteens seemed to shimmer under the bright lights.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the room as she danced in her velveteens.
meanings.sent5: The actor strutted confidently on stage in his velveteens.
